      • close

        public int close()
        Close Picc Card.
        Returns:
        Close Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.

      • detect

        public int detect()
        Detecting the Picc Card.
        Returns:
        Detect Result. 0 : Picc Card Detected, Other : Picc Card Not Detected.

      • detect

        public int detect(java.lang.String mode)
        Detect Specified Card Type.
        Parameters:
        mode - Card Type, Value Range :
        CARDREADER_DETECT_MODE_ISO14443
        CARDREADER_DETECT_MODE_EMV
        CARDREADER_DETECT_MODE_A
        CARDREADER_DETECT_MODE_B
        Returns:
        Detect Result. 0 : Picc Card Detected, Other : Picc Card Not Detected.

      • getCardReaderInfo

        public com.pos.sdk.cardreader.PosCardReaderInfo getCardReaderInfo()
        Get Card Information List.
        Returns:
        PosCardReaderInfo :
        mCategory : Card Reader Category. (Icc Card, Picc Card, Mag Card, Mifare Card, Psam Card)
        mCardType : Card Type.
        mCardChannel : Card Logical Channel Number.
        mSerialNum : Serial Number of the Card, BCD Encoding.
        mAttribute : Card Attribute. (ATR)

      • open

        public int open()
        Open Picc Card.
        Returns:
        Open Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.

                        com.pos.sdk.utils.PosByteArray swBuf)
        APDU Instruction Interaction.
        Parameters:
        inBuf - APDU Command.
        rspBuf - Card Response Result :
        Len : Response Data Length.
        Buffer : Response Data.
        swBuf - Card Response Result :
        Len : Response Data Length.
        Buffer : Response Data.
        Returns:
        APDU Instruction Interaction Result. 0 : Success, Other : Fail.
